title: Initial Disappearance Report
content: Shahram Amiri disappeared while on pilgrimage in Saudi Arabia in June 2009.
preview: Amiri's disappearance raises early questions about defection or abduction...

title: Wikileaks Cable: Amiri Was Recruited
content: Leaked U.S. diplomatic cables suggest Amiri had been recruited by the CIA months before his disappearance.
preview: Recruitment discussed in cables dated early 2009...

title: State Dept. Press Briefing
content: U.S. State Department spokesperson denies involvement in any coercion.
preview: Official denial of any wrongdoing in the Amiri case...

title: Iranian Video Allegation: Amiri Kidnapped
content: A video surfaces allegedly showing Amiri claiming he was kidnapped and tortured by U.S. agents.
preview: Amiri claims coercion and mistreatment on video...

title: Second Video: Voluntary Cooperation
content: A different video shows Amiri claiming he traveled to the U.S. freely and was treated well.

title: CIA Debrief Summary (Leaked)
content: Anonymous sources describe Amiri providing useful but non-critical intel on Iran’s nuclear program.
preview: Intel from Amiri considered helpful but limited...

title: Return to Iran
content: Amiri returns to Iran and is welcomed publicly but later disappears again.
preview: Public hero’s welcome followed by re-arrest...

title: Execution Report
content: In August 2016, Iranian officials confirm Amiri was executed for espionage.
preview: Execution of Amiri shocks international community...

title: Twitter Archive Leak
content: Archive of tweets allegedly from U.S. intel analyst discussing Amiri’s debriefing.
preview: Social media post raises speculation about intel handling...

title: Iranian Court Leak
content: Leak of court summary suggests Amiri was executed for giving minor information but viewed as symbolic punishment.
preview: Court motives seem political rather than based on gravity of info...
